title: Cowpens National Battlefield: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The National Park Service makes every effort to keep visitors informed about news events, special events, park programs and services and new or ongoing projects. News releases for Cowpens National Battlefield will be posted and archived here, so check back to keep current about the happenings at the park.    Cowpens National Battlefield will also keep our visitors informed about what is happening in the park on our Facebook page.
